pages.text: $(li)Frilled Shark are small neutral sharks that appears at the bottom of deep oceans and feeds on Squid and Blobfish.$(br)$(li)Don't stay close of them or they will attack you, inflicting Exsanguination effect, inflicting you an extra damage.$(br)$(li)When left alone, they lure Squid with the shine of their teeth.
When attacking prey, they may to throw out a Serrated Shark Tooth.
